00033 #ifndef __GHOST_EVENTKEY_H__
00034 #define __GHOST_EVENTKEY_H__
00035 
00036 #include "GHOST_Event.h"
00037 
00043 class GHOST_EventKey : public GHOST_Event
00044 {
00045 public:
00052     GHOST_EventKey(GHOST_TUns64 msec,
00053                    GHOST_TEventType type,
00054                    GHOST_IWindow* window,
00055                    GHOST_TKey key)
00056         : GHOST_Event(msec, type, window)
00057     {
00058         m_keyEventData.key = key;
00059         m_keyEventData.ascii = '\0';
00060         m_keyEventData.utf8_buf[0]= '\0';
00061         m_data = &m_keyEventData;
00062     }
00063     
00071     GHOST_EventKey(GHOST_TUns64 msec,
00072                    GHOST_TEventType type,
00073                    GHOST_IWindow* window,
00074                    GHOST_TKey key,
00075                    char ascii,
00076                    const char utf8_buf[6])
00077         : GHOST_Event(msec, type, window)
00078     {
00079         m_keyEventData.key = key;
00080         m_keyEventData.ascii = ascii;
00081         if (utf8_buf) memcpy(m_keyEventData.utf8_buf, utf8_buf, sizeof(m_keyEventData.utf8_buf));
00082         else                 m_keyEventData.utf8_buf[0]= '\0';
00083         m_data = &m_keyEventData;
00084     }
00085         
00086 protected:
00088     GHOST_TEventKeyData m_keyEventData;
00089 };
00090 
00091 #endif // __GHOST_EVENTKEY_H__
